execution_plan.description: Compute how many times each product was sold by counting order items per product and keep those sold more than 3 times.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS sold_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product ids and descriptions for the products identified in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_description FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
